name: MIDI FIVE
short_description: A software to drive, a prototype of experimental 5 fingers MIDI control surface for creating midi control data flow - from exact to aleatoric (randomized) MIDI control data stream. A PLOT >> Nothing in the keyboard or knobs of a oridynary MIDI controller, or any random synthesizer, results from a gesture, from a movement. It does not encourage experimenting, getting away or breaking free from something but just the opposite – it nails one’s ass at the elementary level and has nothing to do with freedom, dynamism, motion and gesture – and after all these basics constitute the foundation of music. But if music is to be, as per scientists, ‘an art of organizing tones in time’ than why are we surprised? I decided to transform regular two octave Midi Controller, into something closer to body.
